00085         // Mon Oct 26 05:23:56 2009 -> ClamAV update process started at Mon Oct 26 05:23:56 2009
00086         $re_datetime= '\w+\s+(\w+\s+\d+)\s+(\d+:\d+:\d+)\s+\d+';
00087         $re_rest= '(.*)';
00088 
00089         $re= "/^$re_datetime\s+->\s+$re_rest$/";
00090         if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00091             $cols['Date']= $match[1];
00092             $cols['Time']= $match[2];
00093             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00094             $cols['Log']= $match[3];
00095             return TRUE;
00096         }
00097         else if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00098             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00099             return TRUE;
00100         }
00101         else {
00102             $cols['Log']= $logline;
00103             return TRUE;
00104         }
00105         return FALSE;
